start.state: Hello, I'm Elizabeth. I suppose we'll be playing strip poker together tonight.

case.state: Ah, so you're up, ~name~.
This should be nothing for you, ~name~!
It's okay, ~name~, take your time.
I have to admit, Alice. You are nothing like Songbird described you.
